title: 1979년 Commonwealth 사건
summary: 미국 Pennsylvania, PA 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Commonwealth. 판결일: 1979-03-16. 법원: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John NETTLES
**판결일**: 1979-03-16
**법원**: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania
**관할**: Pennsylvania, PA

**판사**: Brien, Eagen, Larsen, Manderino, Nix, Roberts

## 변호인

Richard E. Johnson, Philadelphia, for appellant., Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Marrianne E. Cox, Philadelphia, for appellee.

## 인용

- 484 Pa. 156
- 398 A.2d 991

## 판결문 요약


OPINION
PER CURIAM:
This is an appeal from appellant’s conviction of murder of the third degree and conspiracy which arose from the gang related slaying of Stephen Johnson on January 5, 1976. Appellant’s contention that the evidence is insufficient is without merit.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
...
